attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Q. Yet again spring/summer is here and having just had a few nice days of sun and fine weather when one can open doors and windows, we have NICE people who decide to have BONFIRES so one either has to close all windows and doors, or end up with a house stinking of bonfire smoke.

WHY CANT WE HAVE A BAN ON BONFIRES FROM MAY 1st to OCT 1st.
and if no council can ban a bonfire as no bylaw exists.. MAKE ONE.
if you want people to help the planet.. then this bylaw will not only help mother earth.. it will help my blood pressure.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
